name: PULSAR: Lost Colony
description: Team up to operate an advanced starship and explore a randomized galaxy falling into chaos. Each player (up to five) takes on a unique role and must work together in order to find the Lost Colony.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 5000 (Shader Model 3) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Additional Notes: Modern Graphics Card Required (Supported By Manufacturer)
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.8 GHz Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
